strings:
<voice_0x01001822><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Welcome back, brave warriors.
So <hero>, now you know the whole truth.

<voice_0x01001823><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Our misjudgement and closed-mindedness
has caused much strife.
For this, I apologise, <hero>.
<voice_0x01001824><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I suppose your presence here means you wish to undertake the Dragovian Trial?
<voice_0x01001825><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Indeed? Then stand down. This holy dais is intended only for those who seek a Trial.
<voice_0x01001826><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: This pleases me. It has been many centuries since a challenger last requested a Trial of me.

<voice_0x01001827><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well. Brave warriors!
Defeat me and prove your true quality!

<voice_0x01001828><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Welcome back.
I suppose your presence here means you wish
to undertake the Dragovian Trial?

<voice_0x01001845><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well.
I shall transport you back to the Sanctuary.

<voice_0x0100182A><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You deserve a reward for your efforts.
Choose something and it shall be yours.

<voice_0x0100182B><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: That is what you desire?
Are you certain?
<voice_0x0100182C><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Then choose again.

<voice_0x0100182D><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well.
You shall have it!

<voice_0x01001849><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: It has been a great pleasure putting
your strength to the test.
I look forward to your next visit.
<voice_0x01001834><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You dare to appear before me unarmed?
<voice_0x01001835><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Do you expect to defeat me so easily?

<voice_0x01001836><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Is my countenance so vulnerable? So powerless?
Very well. Strike me down with your bare hands, if you feel you are able!
<voice_0x01001837><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Then speak not to me until you have properly prepared yourselves.
<voice_0x01001838><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Seeking a trial without sufficient preparation... Perhaps I overestimated your abilities.

<voice_0x0100183F><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well.
You deserve a reward for your efforts.
Choose something and it shall be yours.
<Cap><leader> obtains <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1> and puts <IF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>them<ELSE_NOT_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>it<ENDIF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1> in the bag.

<voice_0x01001839><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Welcome back, <leader>.
I suppose you are visiting me to test your strength again?
<voice_0x0100183A><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Ah. So you see no reason to face me now that you have completed all of the Dragovian Trials. That is a shame.
<voice_0x0100183B><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: It takes cunning and powerful opponents such as yourselves to bring out my best, and I had only just begun.

<voice_0x0100183C><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well, <hero>.
Prepare to taste the full power of
the Lord of the Dragovians!

<voice_0x0100184A><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I....am impressed...
Never before has anyone overcome the full power of the Lord of the Dragovians...
<voice_0x0100184D><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I am almost afraid to wonder at the true extent of your powers.
<voice_0x01001846><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I...am impressed... Never did I imagine that anyone could overcome the full power of the Lord of the Dragovians...barehanded.
<voice_0x01001847><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Congratulations. As warriors, you have reached the highest pinnacle of your abilities.

<voice_0x01001848><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I have nothing more to give you.
But you are welcome to visit me whenever you wish to test your strength.

<voice_0x01001829><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Well done.
You fought with the valour I would expect of the warriors who saved the Dragovian race.
<voice_0x0100183D><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I never imagined that anyone could defeat me bare-handed. You humans continue to surprise and humble me.
<voice_0x0100183E><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Further evidence, if any were needed, that I was a fool to even consider abandoning my human form...

<voice_0x01001840><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You deserve a reward for your efforts.
Few are left, but choose whichever you desire.

<voice_0x01001830><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You shall have that which you desire.
But further Dragovian Trials await.
<voice_0x01001831><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: If you would like to test your might with another Trial, return to the Dragovian Sanctuary and seek me out.
<voice_0x01001832><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: When you do, be prepared to feel the full power of the Lord of the Dragovians.

<voice_0x01001833><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Very well.
I shall transport you back to the Sanctuary.

<voice_0x01001841><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You have completed the final Dragovian Trial.
You fought well, courageous warriors.

<voice_0x01001842><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I acknowledge your quality and valour.
You are truly worthy of the title: ‘heroes’.
<voice_0x01001843><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You stand alone; none can hope to challenge your abilities. Not even the Lord of Darkness, Rhapthorne himself.
<voice_0x01001844><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Perhaps the time has come for you to return to the world of humans and fulfil your destinies.

<voice_0x0100182E><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Proceed straight ahead from the cursed castle
to a beautiful natural spring.
On its banks you will find a monster.
<voice_0x0100182F><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Defeat it. I am sure you will find it a worthy addition to your team.
<voice_0x0100184B><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: In the land beneath the blanket of white lies an ancient ruin protected by the descendants of the great sages. Go there.
<voice_0x0100184C><se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: The old magic circle will lead you to a place where new, yet familiar, trials await you.
The party's HP and MP are fully restored!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: So, <leader>!
Defeat me if you can, and prove your valour!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I congratulate you on your victory.
I would expect nothing less from
the saviour of the Dragovians!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: To complete the Trial in <val_1> <IF_SING val_1>turn is...incredible! I am impressed!<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns is highly creditable, but you still have some way to go if you wish to prove yourself truly valiant!<ENDIF_SING>
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: The next time you undertake one of the Trials, you will need to demonstrate even more courage and skill!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: ...Impressive. You defeated me in just <val_2> <IF_SING val_2>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING>.
I should have expected nothing less from the saviours of the Dragovians.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I am now able to grant your wish. If you would like to undertake another Trial, revisit the Sanctuary before returning to me here.

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Now you have completed all of the
Dragovian Trials.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Now I can acknowledge your skill and your valour. You have earnt the right to call yourselves ‘heroes’.

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I have nothing more to give you.
But you are welcome to visit me whenever you wish to test your strength.

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I never imagined I could be defeated by
anyone unarmed!
There is more to humans than I realised.

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: To complete the Trial in <val_1> <IF_SING val_1>turn is...incredible! I am impressed!<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns is highly creditable, but you still have some way to go if you wish to prove yourself truly valiant!<ENDIF_SING>

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: To have defeated me without weapons in just
<val_4> <IF_SING val_4>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING>...!?
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: <Cap><leader>! Are there no bounds to your might!?

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Welcome back, <leader>!
As you have already completed the Trials,
I assume you are here simply to test your mettle?
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I see. I suppose we need cross swords no more now that the Trials are over. A shame...

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Then, <leader>, I accept!
Let us see exactly how strong humans
who have passed the Trials can be!
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: What went wrong? It's not like you to need <val_5> <IF_SING val_5>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING> to overpower me!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: I suppose everyone has an off day from time
to time.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: But I hope to see you giving full play to your might the next time we meet!

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Another resounding victory! I suspected it would take warriors who had conquered the Trials just <val_6> <IF_SING val_6>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING> to defeat me.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Truly, you have earnt the right to be called ‘heroes’!
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: You proved yourselves in the Trials, and now you surprise me again. I would not have believed I could be defeated without weapons.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Nevertheless, it is most unlike you to take <val_7> <IF_SING val_7>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING>!
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: But I suppose even great warriors have limits. Hardly surprising in unarmed combat.
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Only warriors who have completed the Trials could defeat me in <val_8> <IF_SING val_8>turn<ELSE_NOT_SING>turns<ENDIF_SING> without weapons!
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: It seems that even I am no match for your fearsome might!
<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: But I will gladly do battle with you again whenever you wish to test your strength.

<se_def>Lord of the Dragovians: Well done.
You fought with the valour I would expect of the warriors who saved the Dragovian race.
